alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Valley; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 09 at 1:56PM PST until November 11 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Brewster, Grand Coulee, Bridgeport, Harrington, Ritzville, Tonasket, Mansfield, Waterville, Oroville, Coulee City, Creston, Odessa, Wilbur, Disautel Pass, Okanogan, Omak, Badger Mountain Road, and Nespelem. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Okanogan Valley; Upper Columbia Basin; Waterville Plateau
